articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Russia appears to be softening its gas-for-rubles demand, easing supply risks to Europe — for now - CNBC
articles.description: In a call with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz, Russia's Vladimir Putin said European firms could continue paying for gas supplies in euros or dollars.
articles.content: A worker adjusts a Gazprom branded end cap on a section of pipework during pipeline laying operations for the Gazprom PJSC Power of Siberia gas transmission line between the Kovyktinskoye and Chayand… [+5509 chars]
